anyOf.description: The unique ID of this message item.

type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_text`.

text.description: The text input to the model.

oneOf.title: Input text
oneOf.description: A text input to the model.

type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_image`.

anyOf.description: The URL of the image to be sent to the model. A fully qualified URL or base64 encoded image in a data URL.

x-enumDescriptions.high: Allows the model to "see" a higher-resolution version of the image, usually increasing input token costs.
x-enumDescriptions.low: Restricts the model to a lower-resolution version of the image.

allOf.description: The detail level of the image to be sent to the model. One of `high`, `low`, or `auto`. Defaults to `auto`.

oneOf.title: Input image
oneOf.description: An image input to the model. Learn about [image inputs](/docs/guides/vision)

type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_file`.

anyOf.description: The name of the file to be sent to the model.
The base64-encoded data of the file to be sent to the model.
The URL of the file to be sent to the model.

oneOf.title: Input file
oneOf.description: A file input to the model.

items.description: A piece of message content, such as text, an image, or a file.

oneOf.description: The message content, as a single string.

content.description: The message content, as an array of content parts.

anyOf.description: The status of the message item.
